original_text: Gallio then became the Roman ruler of the region called Achaia. At this time the Jewish leaders in Corinth decided together to speak against Paul. So they took hold of him and they brought him to Gallio. They wanted Gallio to judge Paul.
korean_text: 갈리오가 아가야 총독 되었을 때에 유대인이 일제히 일어나 바울을 대적하여 법정으로 데리고 가서

sentences.original_text: Gallio then became the Roman ruler
At this time the Jewish leaders in Corinth
decided together to speak against Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 함께 결심하여 바울을 반대하여 말하기로 했습니다

sentences.original_text: So they took hold of him
and they brought him to Gallio
They wanted Gallio to judge Paul
